headline: Does Charter’s (CHTR) Legal Scrutiny Over Disclosures Reshape Confidence in Its Growth Strategy?
summary: In August 2025, multiple law firms filed class action lawsuits against Charter Communications and certain executives, alleging violations of federal securities laws related to the company's disclosures after the end of the Affordable Connectivity Program and amid declines in internet customers and revenue. These legal actions followed the release of Charter's second quarter results, which showed a decrease in internet subscribers and investor concerns about the quality of reported EBITDA...
